::Triggerhappy/Skullgrin::

   Triggerhappy and Skullgrin arrived at the lo=
cation of the pods.  They transformed to robot mode, and searched, and then=
 found the pods and ran over.

    "Yoohoo!  Anybody home?  Come out before=
 I slag ya!" Triggerhappy warned.

    Silence.....Then, the two pods opene=
d up!  Two tall, tough looking bots emerged, and looked at Triggerhappy and=
 Skullgrin.

    "Jume, we've finally arrived on Earth, as our creator orde=
red us to do so......But Bananna didn't seem to make it....." said the less=
er-looking bot.

    "Yes, Whee, indeed, but look at these transformers who=
 have found us?  The creator Jeremiah never told us that there were other t=
ransformers here..." said Whee.

    Jume nodded, then looked at T.Happy an=
d S.grin.  

   "So, do you by any chance belong to a certain faction?" Jum=
e asked.

    "Yes, we are Decepticons, under the rule of the great Megatro=
n!  And what is this?  You speak of a creator?  Do you wish to continue to =
follow this creator rather than the Decepticons!?" Skullgrin questioned.

 =
    "Oh, our creator said to join whatever faction offers first," Whee said=
.

     "I see....Well, join the Decepticons, we're the best faction on thi=
s blasted rock!" Triggerhappy said.

     Whee and Jume nodded.

     "Ok, =
follow us, we'll take ya back ter are base," Triggerhappy stated, then tran=
sformed to jet mode and speeded off to the Dark Avian.

      "He doesn't e=
ven think.....What modes do yas have?" Skullgrin asked.

      Jume transfo=
rmed to beast mode....His beast mode was.....Ugh....He couldn't transform t=
o a beast mode.  HOWFUCKINGEVER, he had a sort-of vehicle mode: A jet!

   =
   Whee also had a vehicle mode: A firetruck....

       Skullgrin transfor=
med to tank mode and went back to the Dark Avian.  Whee and Jume followed i=
n their vehicle modes...



~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
~~~~~~~LurkerAbyss~~~~~=
~~
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
~The Keeper Of Souls~
~The Shadow Of The Dark~
~=
I Am The Lurker Of The Abyss~
